name: Bubble BalLl Color - Shooter Magic
description:
Bubble BalLl Color - Shooter Magic is a popular time killer game, its free and suitable both for kids and adults! It's easy, extremely addictive and takes you into an ocean island survey!
Features:
* easy to play - just tap the screen to shoot bubble in tap direction
* beautiful graphic!
* fantastic bonuses to use
* 2 game modes
